name: Atelier Questboard
summary: Atelier Questboard was a casual game made by Koei Tecmo for Android and iOS. With a focus on locations from Atelier Rorona, it featured various characters from the Atelier franchise. The goal of the game was to collect various materials and to build relationships with other characters.

videos.name: Teaser
videos.title: 『アトリエ クエストボード』 TVCF
